All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddDirectoryCommand
AddDirectoryCommand represents the add directory file manager operation.
AddFileCommand
AddFileCommand represents the add file, file manager operation.
BitMap
BitMap is a 2-dimensional array representing a map of bits
BitMapException
 
BitMapNextFitNotFoundException
 
BitMapPositionAlreadySetException
 
BitMapPositionAlreadyUnsetException
 
ChangeDirCommand
ChangeDirCommand represents the change dir file manager operation.
Command
Command is a representation of an operation in the FileSystemManager containing the data required to perform the operation itself.
CommandInterface
CommandInterface is responsible for translating user input to commands
CommandInterfaceTest
 
CommandMissingArgumentsException
 
CommandNotFoundException
 
CommandParser
CommandParser is responsible for, given a raw string command, matching it to a Command object.
DeleteInstanceCommand
AddDirectoryCommand represents the delete file manager operation for both directories and files.
DEntry
DEntry represents an entry in a directory and contains its business rules
DiskDriver
DiskDriver is the disk driver responsible for manipulating the virtual disk
driverTest
 
ExitCommand
ExitCommand represents the exit application operation.
FileManagementInterface
 
FileManagerApplication
 
FileSystemManager
FileSystemManager is the kernel of the application.
FileType
FileType is an enum containing all possible file types each filetype is associated with a byte value
HelpCommand
HelpCommand represents the help application operation.
InvalidEntryException
 
InvalidLengthForSnodeException
 
InvalidSNodeException
 
ListDirCommand
ListDirCommand represents the list directory file manager operation.
ParseCommandFileCommand
ParseCommandFileCommand represents the parse file manager operation.
SaveCommand
SaveCommand represents the save disk application operation.
SNode
SNode is a snode in the file system
SNodeDir
 
SNodeFile
 
VirtualDisk
VirtualDisk is a random access byte array used to represent the file system in memory
VirtualDiskInspectionInterface
 
VirtualFileNotFoundException
